00035 typedef shared_ptr<class SourceFile>    SourceFileRef;
00036 typedef shared_ptr<class LoaderSourceFile>  LoaderSourceFileRef;
00037 
00038 class LoaderSourceFile : public Loader {
00039  public:
00040     static LoaderSourceFileRef  createRef( SourceFile *source, Target *target );
00041     
00042     ~LoaderSourceFile() {}
00043

00045     void setSampleOffset( uint64_t anOffset );
00046     void loadData( BufferList *ioData );

00049 
00050     LoaderSourceFile( SourceFile *source, Target *target );
00051

00053     shared_ptr<CocoaCaConverter>    mConverter;
00054     uint64_t                        mPacketOffset;
00055

00057 
00058 class SourceFile : public Source {
00059   public:
00060     static SourceRef        createRef( DataSourceRef dataSourceRef ) { return createFileRef( dataSourceRef ); }
00061     static SourceFileRef    createFileRef( DataSourceRef dataSourceRef );
00062     ~SourceFile();
00063 
00064     virtual LoaderRef createLoader( Target *target ) { return LoaderSourceFile::createRef( this, target ); }
00065 
00066     double getDuration() const { return mDuration; };
00067 
00068     static void     registerSelf();
00069   protected:
00070     SourceFile( DataSourceRef dataSourceRef );
00071     
00072     uint64_t packetAtTime( double aTime ) const;
00073     double timeAtPacket( uint64_t aPacket ) const;
00074     
00075     uint64_t packetAtSample( uint64_t aSample ) const;
00076     uint64_t sampleAtPacket( uint64_t aPacket ) const;
00077     
00078     shared_ptr<OpaqueAudioFileID>   mFileRef;
00079     
00080     uint64_t    mPacketCount;
00081     uint64_t    mByteCount;
00082     double      mDuration;
00083     uint32_t    mMaxPacketSize;
00084     
00085     friend class LoaderSourceFile;
00086 };
